Package io.github.jgame.event

Class EventRobot

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Robot
      • io.github.jgame.event.EventRobot
  • public class EventRobot
extends java.awt.Robot
    Extension of Robot

    Adds easy way for Robot to type out String literals and click and release mouse.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      EventRobot()
      Create a new robot!

    • Method Detail

      • typeAscii

        public void typeAscii​(java.lang.String msg,
                      int waitBetween,
                      int holdTime)
        Simulate the user typing a string literal
        Parameters:
        msg - String literal to type
        waitBetween - Time to wait in milliseconds in between each keystroke
        holdTime - Time to hold down each key in milliseconds

      • getPixelRGBA

        public int[] getPixelRGBA​(int x,
                          int y)
        Get the color of a specific pixel on the screen in the form of a int array.
        Parameters:
        x - X position on the screen (pixels)
        y - Y position on the screen (pixels)
        Returns:
        Color (and alpha) in the form of an array. new int[]{red, green, blue, alpha}

      • clickMouse

        public void clickMouse​(int holdTime,
                       int button)
        Simulate the user clicking and releasing the mouse
        Parameters:
        holdTime - Time to hold the mousebutton down
        button - Mouse button to press (integer between 1 and 3 inclusive)
